title: Google teams up with NBA to create ‘Pixel Arena’ virtual experience
content:
Google regularly creates augmented reality and virtual experiences in partnership with brands or events, usually in the form of temporary features in the Google Search mobile app. This time around, Google has partnered with the NBA to create a ‘Pixel Arena’ accessible to all mobile devices, with a character customizer and a few mini-games related

The post Google teams up with NBA to create ‘Pixel Arena’ virtual experience appeared first on xda-developers.
